function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential for spread of SARS-CoV-2 in buildings due to viral particles associated with larger particles that can potentially penetrate high efficiency filters.","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne transmission of SARS-CoV-2 within the built environment.","Mitigation":"Enhanced building HVAC operational practices, proper filter installation, and maintenance.","Technologies":"High efficiency filters, ventilation systems, air-handling units.","People":"Occupants of buildings, particularly in areas with higher transmission rates of SARS-CoV-2.","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, HVAC maintenance professionals."}]}
